it seems that the FTP task hangs when given an incorrect configuration.  I would have expected it to immediately exit instead.

Example of failing config:

  <target name="ftptest">
    <ftp action="list"
       listing="toc.txt"
       server="ftp.ngdc.noaa.gov"
       userid="anonymous"
       password="anonymous"
       remotedir="hazards">
   <fileset dir=".">
      <include name="*.jpg"/>
    </fileset>
  </ftp>
creator: john.c.cartwright@noaa.gov
